text:
차상균 교수님의 서머리와 함께 아래 aritcle 공유드립니다.
"Two Berkeley professors, each gave the university $25M from the cash that they earned from Databricks - Spark software company.
*Databricks*
Big data is big business, which is why investors are a salivating over a potential IPO of this San Francisco–based software firm. It’s one of the most valuable private tech companies around, having raised $1 billion at a $28 billion valuation just months ago. Since it’s on track for more than a billion in revenue in 2022, the analytics giant has observers likening it to another recent blockbuster software IPO, that of Snowflake."
<https://fortune.com/2021/07/08/ipos-2021-robinhood-duolingo-couchbase-sweetgreen-authentic-brands-group-rivian-automotive-nerdwallet-nextdoor-discord-instacart-databricks-warby-parker-allbirds-chime-thrasio-bytedance/|https://fortune.com/2021/07/08/ipos-2021-robinhood-duolingo-couchbase-sweetgreen-a[…]acart-databricks-warby-parker-allbirds-chime-thrasio-bytedance/>

attachments.fallback: Fortune: The IPO rush is on. Here are the companies that may go public this year
attachments.title: The IPO rush is on. Here are the companies that may go public this year
attachments.text: Robinhood. Rivian. Discord. Here's the lowdown on some of the biggest names that might mount IPOs in 2021.

차상균 교수님의 서머리와 함께 아래 aritcle 공유드립니다.
"Two Berkeley professors, each gave the university $25M from the cash that they earned from Databricks - Spark software company.

Big data is big business, which is why investors are a salivating over a potential IPO of this San Francisco–based software firm. It’s one of the most valuable private tech companies around, having raised $1 billion at a $28 billion valuation just months ago. Since it’s on track for more than a billion in revenue in 2022, the analytics giant has observers likening it to another recent blockbuster software IPO, that of Snowflake."

text:
slurm을 사용할 때 shell script에서 conda activate를 하려고 하면 아래와 같은 메시지가 뜨면서 에러가 나는데, `source ~/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh` 를 conda activate 위에 추가해주니 해결되네요.
<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55507519/python-activate-conda-env-through-shell-script/60523131#60523131>
```CommandNotFoundError: Your shell has not been properly configured to use 'conda activate'.
To initialize your shell, run

    $ conda init <SHELL_NAME>

Currently supported shells are:
  - bash
  - fish
  - tcsh
  - xonsh
  - zsh
  - powershell

See 'conda init --help' for more information and options.

IMPORTANT: You may need to close and restart your shell after running 'conda init'.```

attachments.fallback: Stack Overflow: Python - Activate conda env through shell script
attachments.title: Python - Activate conda env through shell script
attachments.text: I am hoping to run a simple shell script to ease the management around some conda environments. Activating conda environments via conda activate in a linux os works fine in the shell but is proble...

elements.text: slurm을 사용할 때 shell script에서 conda activate를 하려고 하면 아래와 같은 메시지가 뜨면서 에러가 나는데,
를 conda activate 위에 추가해주니 해결되네요.
